All the SCAdian talk has got me thinking. I wonder how many EQ players
are also SCAdians and also how many used their SCA name for EQ, like me?

Lets see my names are:
Bebinn Maolcataig, beloved consort of Wolfgang Schwartzvald, Barony of
Bright Hills, Atlantia.

Bebinn Maolcataig, 26 Woodelf Druid, Dignatio cum Demori guild, Bertoxx
server

and

Lindira, 23 Vah Shir Bard, Bertoxx server, *looking for other Vahshir to
help complete sonic weapon quest, if you like quests and know about
warrior, shaman or rogue classes, consider making a vahshir*
